column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Aang says : " Sokka , maybe this is n't such a good idea .
#Text=I ca n't back out just because of some bad weather .
#Text=" Fisherman 's wife says : " The boy with the tattoos has some sense .
#Text=You should listen to him !
#Text=" Fisherman says : " Boy with tattoos ?
#Text=Airbender tattoos .
#Text=Well , I 'll be a hog monkey 's uncle .
#Text=You 're the Avatar , ai n't ya ?
#Text=" Katara says : " That 's right .
#Text=" Fisherman says : " Well , do n't be so smiley about it .
#Text=The Avatar disappeared for a hundred years !
#Text=You turned your back on the world !
#Text=" Katara says : " Do n't yell at him !
#Text=Aang would never turn his back on anyone .
#Text=" Fisherman says : " Oh , he would n't , huh ?
#Text=Then I guess I must have imagined the last hundred years of war and suffering .
#Text=" Katara says : " Aang is the bravest person I know .
#Text=He 's done nothing but help people and save lives since I met him .
#Text=It 's not his fault he disappeared , right Aang ?
#Text=Aang , what 's wrong ?
#Text=" Fisherman says : " That 's right !
#Text=Keep flying !
#Text=" Katara says : " You 're a horrible old man !
#Text=Appa , yip yip !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Hey !
#Text=They left without saying good - bye !
#Text=" Fisherman says : " Your friends ai n't too polite , are they ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " I know !
#Text=This one time , I was ... " Fisherman says : " Yeah , yeah , yeah , yeah .
#Text=Get below deck !
#Text="
